communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Metropolitan Police Department Contract Requests
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

-MPD contracts signed that have been enacted in programs such as new equipment initiatives and external contractors including financial information such as overall cost.

As per response of the MPD of D.C., I have been instructed to direct this request to this office.

In order to help to determine my status to assess fees, you should know that I am an affiliate of HIPS DC and will be using this information for internal analysis.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Grant Colby

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Metropolitan Police Department Expendature Requests
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

-Monthly Expense reports between January 2018 and November 2022.

-Itemized reports and receipts over the same date range detailing what was purchased and spent each month across the entirety of the MPD, including office expenses such as new office equipment and bonuses such as sign-on benefits.
If these documents exist on per-precinct bases and a total across the entirety of the Metropolitan Police Department, both are requested.

As per response of the MPD of D.C., I have been instructed to direct this request to this office.

In order to help to determine my status to assess fees, you should know that I am an affiliate of HIPS DC and will be using this information for internal analysis.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Grant Colby

communications.subject: DC Freedom of Information Act Request: Armoured One contract
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the DC Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Copy of the security contract signed with Armoured One for 2022

In order to help to determine my status to assess fees, you should know that I am an affiliate of HIPS DC and will be using this information for internal analysis.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 15 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Grant Colby
